How to use DBS GuideÂ¶

The following section is a tutorial that explains how to use DBS Guide. Provided are two sections, Surgery Walk-through and Widgets. We recommend you to start with Surgery Walk-through as it will explain how to use DBS Guide at each phase of the surgery (pre/intra/post-operation). Widgets is a great reference that explains how to use each widget. Start with Pre-op

Note

Make sure to install 3D Slicer and DBS Guide. Visit our installation tutorial.
